mapper.select: select id, username, password, nikename, admin_course, qq, phone, email, status, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.student where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, nikename, admin_course, qq, phone, email, status, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2 from yikaodb.student limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yikaodb.student(username, password, nikename, admin_course, qq, phone, email, status, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nikename}, #{adminCourse}, #{qq}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{obj1}, #{obj2})

insert into yikaodb.student(username, password, nikename, admin_course, qq, phone, email, status, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.nikename}, #{entity.adminCourse}, #{entity.qq}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})

insert into yikaodb.student(username, password, nikename, admin_course, qq, phone, email, status, createtime, updatetime, obj1, obj2) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.nikename}, #{entity.adminCourse}, #{entity.qq}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.obj1}, #{entity.obj2})
on duplicate key update username = values(username) , password = values(password) , nikename = values(nikename) , admin_course = values(admin_course) , qq = values(qq) , phone = values(phone) , email = values(email) , status = values(status) , createtime = values(createtime) , updatetime = values(updatetime) , obj1 = values(obj1) , obj2 = values(obj2)
mapper.update:
update yikaodb.student
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
nikename = #{nikename},
admin_course = #{adminCourse},
qq = #{qq},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
status = #{status},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
obj1 = #{obj1},
obj2 = #{obj2},
where id = #{id}
